title: Upgrade from v1
body:
These versions are **not** for public sites. 
If you want to upgrade from v1, follow the instructions below. Please note, once you install v2, you **can not** downgrade to v1 so make sure you have a backup.

1. Backup your current v1 files and the database.
2. Remove all of the v1 files from your web server.
3. Upload all of the v2 files from the Github using the link provided below.
4. Run through the installer and make sure you select that this is an upgrade from v1 when installing.

Latest **Pre-release** (v2.0.0-pr7) <https://github.com/NamelessMC/Nameless/archive/v2.0.0-pr7.zip>
Latest **Development** Code: <https://github.com/NamelessMC/Nameless/archive/v2.zip>
